emailVerification.disclaimer: If you did not signup for Hassanah, please disregard this email.

heroSection.heading: Hassanah, Your Islamic Resource
heroSection.text: Gain access to the Quran (with tafseers), Hadiths, and Islamic knowledge on Hassanah platform.

aboutUs.intro: Hassanah is an Islamic website created to provide a comprehensive and user-friendly experience for exploring the Quran, prophetic hadiths, and inspiring Islamic content.

features.title: Our Core Features
features.quran: Explore the Holy Quran with listening and read-only modes, featuring a wide selection of reciters.
features.hadiths: Delve into the wisdom of the Prophet Muhammad (S.A.W) with our collection of verified hadith books. (Sahih al-bukhari, Sahih al-muslim etc...)
features.videos: Discover curated Islamic YouTube videos from trusted sources for enriching knowledge and spiritual growth.
features.prayer: Stay connected to your prayer times with accurate calculations tailored to your timezone and helpful reminders.
features.festivals: Never miss an important Islamic festival with our comprehensive calendar and notifications.

blueteam.title: Created by Blueteam
blueteam.description: Hassanah was created from the Blueteam's dedication to building a valuable digital resource for Muslims worldwide. We began this journey on February 19th, 2024, and are proud to offer Hassanah as an open-source project on GitHub: abuj4m4l/hassanah
blueteam.description2: We began this journey on February 19th, 2024, and are proud to offer Hassanah as an open-source project on GitHub repo.
